name: Invisible Seams (Demo)
description:
The fairy dressmaker Moth is a charismatic, skillful, nervous ball of perfectionism. Despite his anxieties, he is determined to prove himself in the bustling city of Fitzburg. Not an easy task, since the treasurer of the local Tailors' Guild is dead-set on keeping him off his turf! Right when Moth is feeling the most like a fish out of water, he encounters a timid lycan tailor, Caesar, who is going through the same hardships for different reasons. Realizing that they are stronger together, they team up for a daring collaboration.

Will they manage to forge a trustful bond and take a stand for their art, or will the relentless trials of the Guild be too much for them to handle?

A playthrough of the demo takes approximately 25 minutes. It's a teaser for the full story.

This story is a spinoff to my free fantasy dating sim Lovewood! However, you don't need any prior knowledge to understand and enjoy Invisible Seams.

Plans for the final game
  •  A story that'll take ca. 2.5 hours to finish
  •  Plenty of wholesome and dramatic moments
  • Different endings depending on the choices that were made on the way
  • A romance route for those who fancy it
  • An abundance of lovingly hand-drawn art

Coming later in 2022!

Content Warnings

This demo is SFW and safe to stream. There are a few suggestive jokes and some mild swearing.
The protagonist uses male pronouns.

Accessibility

Measures were taken to make this game accessible to blind players. You can activate self-voicing by pressing V at any point in the game.
Audio captions for relevant sounds can be activated in the Options.
Screenshake is enabled by default, but can be turned off in the Options menu.
